instructions.title: SURFACE PREPARATION
instructions.data:
Install and secure joints as per manufacturer’s recommendations.
Check paint compatibility and recommended drying time of the applied joint compound.
Surface to be painted should be clean and dry, free from dust and dirt and all possible contaminants.

instructions.title: PAINTING SCHEDULE
instructions.data: Primer: BOYSEN®® Permacoat™ Flat Latex B‑701 Texture: BOYSEN®® Permatex™ B‑3101 Topcoat (2 coats): BOYSEN®® Permacoat™ Latex (optional)

instructions.title: NOTES
instructions.data: Different textured effects may be achieved by using a variety of design rollers. BOYSEN®® Healthy Home™ and Virtuoso™ Silk Touch™ can also be used as topcoat after application of BOYSEN®® Permatex™ B‑3101.

calculator.title: Primer
calculator.item: BOYSEN®® Permacoat™ Latex Flat Latex B‑701

calculator.title: (Optional) Topcoat
calculator.note: Other option for colored topcoats: BOYSEN®® Healthy Home™ or Virtuoso™ Silk Touch™.

calculator.title: Note: Install and secure joints as per manufacturer's recommendation
